issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
 Pictures #15 and #24 in "Coverflow Remote Files" page are missing.

Steps:
1. Launch KitchenSink. 
2. Go to Views> Coverflow View > Coverflow Remote Files.
3. Try to open every picture on the page.

Expected results:
All pictures should be successfully loaded.

Actual results:
Pictures #15 and #24 are missing.

Note: broken links http://grin.hq.nasa.gov/IMAGES/SMALL/GPN-2000-000061.jpg
http://grin.hq.nasa.gov/IMAGES/SMALL/GPN-2000-000052.jpg
fields.summary: iOS: Some of the pictures  in "Coverflow Remote Files" page are missing.
fields.environment:
Tested on:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.2.201208301612
Titanium Studio SDK, build:2.1.3.v20120915120319
Devices:
iPad 3 -iOS6
iPhone 6 -iOS6
iPad 2 (version 4.3.5)

comments.body:
Also occurs on:
Titanium Studio, build: 2.1.2.201208301612
Titanium Studio SDK, build:2.1.3.v20120921190208
Devices:
iPhone 5 -ios6
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
